averycowan.checkers

Class CheckersGUIController<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.gridworld.gui.GUIController<T>
      • averycowan.checkers.CheckersGUIController<T>

  • public class CheckersGUIController<T>
extends GUIController<T>
    This class extends GUIController to convert the JSlider into a difficulty slider rather than a time slider.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static int INITIAL_ITERS
      The default depth on the slider
      protected static int MAX_ITERS
      The maximum allowed depth on the slider
      protected static int MIN_ITERS
      The minimum allowed depth on the slider
